Posts.Content: Aug 4, 2013 08:38PM linfer7358 wrote: Hi! please give me some inputs why i have this breast pain for over 2 weeks now..I was diagnosed 10/2010 ..IDC stage 1 grade 3..had a lumpectomy and node sentinel removal and followed by radiation..but this past weeks  i started to have pain constantly ..It bothers me a lot...I am scheduled to have mamo this september which I've been doing it every 6 months..Is there anyone here experienced same.. I appreciate any advice..Thanks and God bless! Linda
Posts.Title: Cancer vs Noncancer Pain: Time to Shed the Distinction? cp418 shoppygirl

Posts.Content: Aug 23, 2011 01:30PM linfer7358 wrote: Thank you to all!..I talked to my primary dr. and she asked me if i started already my iron supplement..I said yes!..So she said that the cause of my stool to turn black is the iron supplement..Thank God!..The other thing is my stomach still somewhat in pain or feeling acidic i don't know..Just scares me every pains and aches my mind is everywhere..And I told to my dr. that i had already done the stomach biopsy last 2008 when i was first told i was anemic and the gastroenterologist told me that there was no bleeding except i had gastritis..So my primary dr. said she wasn't worry because it was checked and not bleeding..And now, i am worried again, about my cough that doesnt go away it is already almost a month..My dr. said i have allergies but the nostril spray she prescribed didnt help still i am coughing..Oh!..I will see my onco this friday and i might tell her about this and i hope its not affecting my lungs..Here i am again..Thank again to all and i pray that we get through with this!..God bless!..
Posts.Title: Re-anemia can be caused by BC linfer7358 mari55

Posts.Content: linfer7358 wrote: Hi!..I was diagnosed with BC a year ago..I am just very concerned about recently my result in blood test that says i have an ANEMIA..Today i am terrified when i went to bathroom my stool was black..I am afraid if i am bleeding inside..I have stomach pain..I was asked to see a gastrointerolist to see my stomach..I had seen a gastro 3 yrs ago and found out that i had gastritis..I just read about abdominal cancer and afraid the bc might spread to my stomach..I am again out and lost..Is there anyone happens to have the same symptoms and what did they do?..Please help me get throught with this..I have no family close to me and am alone..Please help!..Prayers to all!..
